title: The coupled volatile and redox evolution of the biosphere and the mantle
abstractText: Not required for scoping proposal (please see correspondence with Sasha Leigh)
impactText: This was a scoping grant to explore potential research links in the UK in the general area of the deep Earth & mantle volatiles as applied to planet habitability. The grant was used to fund a workshop and several breakout meetings. The result/impact of the grant was a successful application to NERC ("Mantle Volatiles: processes, reservoirs and fluxes"; NE/M000303/1) Other Societal,Economic,Policy & public services
findingsText: This was a scoping grant to explore potential research links in the UK in the general area of the deep Earth &amp; mantle volatiles as applied to planet habitability. The grant was used to fund a workshop and several breakout meetings. The result/impact of the grant was a successful application to NERC (Mantle Volatiles: processes, reservoirs and fluxes; NE/M000303/1) Further research through funded grant NE/M000303/1 Other
